nossoMarSalveOsPatos.title: Our Sea Saves the Ducklings
nossoMarSalveOsPatos.description: Game independently developed in Unity with C#, where I acted as programmer and project leader. The game's goal is to raise awareness about environmental pollution.

estagioPlanetEco.title: Software Development Intern - Planet Eco
estagioPlanetEco.description: Currently contributing to the maintenance and improvement of the company's internal systems by developing new features and fixing bugs. I am also learning data analysis with Excel and Power BI, and participating in client interactions to understand their needs and provide technical support.

deckIfy.title: DeckIfy
deckIfy.description: DeckIfy is a web platform focused on automating your studies by generating Anki flashcards with AI. Developed with React.js and Python, it is 100% open source.

chatBotAI.title: ChatBot AI
chatBotAI.description: An intelligent chatbot implementation in JavaScript, designed to provide realistic and interactive conversations. It uses artificial intelligence to interpret user input and respond dynamically.

artigoCientifico.title: Scientific Article
artigoCientifico.description: Scientific article analyzing the economic impact of the pandemic on Airbnb, using Python for data collection, filtering, and analysis.
